text: confirmed positive for covid-19 employee received confirmation of positive covid-19 test results. contact tracking underway.

category: slips & trips, foot or leg injury
text: other fall to lower level, unspecified an employee fractured a knee after slipping and sliding down the lint slide on a cotton gin.
fall on same level while climbing stairs, steps, or curbs an employee tripped on a curb and fell to the ground on their side. the employee suffered five broken ribs.
